name: Resurvey; amended map or plat
text: §441-8  Resurvey; amended map or plat.  Any plat of the property mapped or platted in accordance with this chapter may be resurveyed and replatted, and an amended map or plat filed, so long as such change does not disturb the interred remains of any deceased person. [L 1967, c 199, pt of §1; HRS §441-8]
